name: A Research Paper by Pir Kavikavus
desc: This paper is titled "Theory and Practice: Enhancing the Safety of the Chaos Core in Unstable Conditions Using the Khaenri'ah Ruin Golem of Devantaka Mountain as an Example." The body of the paper is riddled with jargon. If you are not a senior Kshahrewar researcher, chances are that the paper's argument will be no less than unfathomable.

value.text: A Research Paper by Pir Kavikavus
World Quest Until Vana is Healed
